channel.title: C++ text based game
channel.description:
Here is a text based game I made and don't want to finish. It has a few bugs that still need working out and it needs to be finished. Its got the basis of the player values (experience, gold, mana, etc..)
Uhh well yeah. You can edit this anyway you want to no credits to me... and just use the Application called Game in the release folder to run it. To edit ti use the files in the main Game file.
[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/54808998/Game.rar.html][b]DOWNLOAD HERE[/b][/url] - Zip Download (RapidShare) No Virus... Scan it if you want.
PICTURES:
[img]http://i15.tinypic.com/4tse3iu.jpg[/img] [img]http://i4.tinypic.com/4qe1to6.jpg[/img]
It has more options then just these pictures... but not all the options work. As it is not finished.
Credits for writing:
ME
NOTE: I will take this down if people don't post. And I don't care if its a harsh comment... I am just learning C++ and I don't want to finish it. I want to try some other thing out.

item.title: C++ text based game
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:15, topic:142159”][quote author=thiefmn6092 link=topic=194555.msg1780459#msg1780459 date=1190766494]

I downloaded it, it doesn’t seem to want to compile, I changed a few things but I don’t have time to fix all it wants done. Also it is a really strange structure, how you include Library.h but all it consists of is other include statements.

It’s called a meta-include file, and it’s used a lot.
[/quote]

Whether it should be or not…[/quote]

Well, in this particular instance, it might not make sense to use it. However, it is very useful a lot of times.

Read full topic

item.title: C++ text based game
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I downloaded it, it doesn’t seem to want to compile, I changed a few things but I don’t have time to fix all it wants done. Also it is a really strange structure, how you include Library.h but all it consists of is other include statements.

It’s called a meta-include file, and it’s used a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: C++ text based game
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It’s just not generally good programming practice, as the programmer wants to know what exactly has been included and therefore what he is working with in each file. Just a suggestion, thats all
